875640.name: Mechanisms of Mystery: A VR Escape Game
875640.description:
Mechanisms of Mystery is an exciting VR escape game that will transport you to a mysterious location where you must use your problem-solving skills to escape. With challenging puzzles and an immersive environment, this game provides an engaging adventure for all VR enthusiasts.

To escape from the mysterious location, you'll need to utilize your problem-solving skills to interact with the environment and solve a variety of puzzles. Each puzzle is uniquely designed to challenge you in different ways, ranging from deciphering puzzles to manipulating machinery. As you progress through the game, you'll discover hidden clues that will help you ultimately escape the location.

Mechanisms of Mystery offers an intuitive VR experience that draws you into its mysterious world. With easy-to-use controls, you'll use your problem-solving skills to explore the environment and solve challenging puzzles.

So, put on your VR headset and get ready to embark on a journey full of mystery and intrigue.

Supports Vive and Oculus for sure. Valve Index controls can be remapped to be compatible. I am a single dev without access to all the VR headsets. Please feel free to reach out if you have any issues playing my game or want to help make it compatible with more headsets. Thank you!
